*the Online Summer Workshop in Environment, Energy, and Transportation (Economics)*

<center>
<p>

        Papers and videos **will not** be circulated. <br><br>

    </tr>

        There will be no discussants, but we will provide a time for questions after each paper. We will try and cluster papers by topic. <br><br>
        The organizers of **AERE\@OSWEET** include <a href="https://www.xinming-du.com/" style="text-decoration:none">Xinming Du</a> (NUS); <a href="https://www.emilypakhtigian.com/" style="text-decoration:none">Emily L.
